attributes.action: Abolish pay per view boxing across all television platforms.
attributes.background: Boxing is the only sport where all the top fights are pay per view, why should this be? Most sport fans have to subscribe to watch sports anyway ie sky sports, bt sport why should boxing fans have to pay further to watch the top fights its absolutely scandalous.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition, as the issue you raise isn't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to start a petition calling for certain boxing fights to be added to the list of sporting events that have to be aired on free-to-view channels. You can find out more about that here:

https://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN00802
